titleStmt.title: A full vindication and ansvver of the XI. accused members; viz. Denzill Holles, Esq; Sir Philip Stapleton, Sir William Lewis, Sir John Clotworthy, Sir William Waller, Sir Iohn Maynard Kts Major Gen. Massey, Iohn Glynne Esq; Recorder of London. Walter Long Esquire Col. Edward Harley, Anthony Nichols Esq to a late printed pamphlet intituled, A particular charge or impeachment, in the name of Sir Thomas Fairfax and the army under his command; against the said members, by his appointment and the Councel of War.
titleStmt.author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.

titleStmt.title: A full vindication and ansvver of the XI. accused members; viz. notesStmt.note: Attributed to William Prynne by Wing.
Imperfect: trimmed at foot, affecting imprint.
